landingPage.subtitle1: Search for the same symbol on both cards and click on it on the revealed card. Be careful! It's a time management game!
landingPage.subtitle2: Raise the difficulty level and increase the number of icons on the card! Have fun!

number_icons_on_the_card: The number of icons on the card.
info_about_game_desktop: Click on the correct symbol on the tab on the left!
info_about_game_mobile: Click on the correct symbol on the bottom tab!
